hero.title: Connecting Hearts, Creating Families
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in the surrogacy journey. We bring together intended parents and surrogates with compassion, expertise, and unwavering support.

features.title: Why Choose Network Surrogacy
features.subtitle: We provide comprehensive support throughout your surrogacy journey

matching.title: Expert Matching
matching.description: Our advanced matching system connects intended parents with compatible surrogates based on preferences, values, and compatibility.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock support from our experienced team of coordinators, counselors, and medical professionals.

legal.title: Legal Guidance
legal.description: Comprehensive legal support to ensure all parties are protected throughout the surrogacy process.
